Isaac Sebenius

Biography

Isaac is interested in developing new computational methods that leverage biological knowledge to address open questions related to mental health and psychiatric disorders. In particular, Isaacâ€™s work seeks to characterize and predict the spectrum of psychotic disorders by using machine learning to combine multiple types of neuroimaging-derived brain connectivity as well as genetic and other biological data.

Institution: Cambridge University

Position: PhD Student

Team: main

CRSID: iss31
